Un gran juego que te da la oportunidad de cooperar con tus amigos y reparar ciertas maquinas para poder escapar del mapa. Al comienzo debo admitir que no pensaba que era bueno, pero despues de conocer los perks que son habilidades, empiezas a darte cuenta que aumentar de nivel a cada personaje tiene ventajas. Un gran juego que la puedes pasar divertido con tus amigos. No es necesario comprar los DLC a menos que quieras tal personaje, en especial los asesinos. 10/10 :D:

I fucking love Dead By Daylight. I 100% recommend this game to new steam players.

I love this game very very much; to me this isn't just a game, but this is where you can find amazing friends, get content for those who are twitch streamers or youtubers, but most importantly, having an amazing time. You will have some good games, very intense games, and a lot of bad games, but just because you get a lot of bad games, doesn't mean you should just quit the game and move onto finding a new one. Yes you will get some very high skilled teammates and you will get some low skilled teammates who love to hide in the corner of the map. However, if you play this game, i 100% recommend playing with a friend or 3 friends. 

I do love this game very much, but there are a lot of things i dislike about the game. For example, when you play in live games, you might get hit from a few feet away, that's because hitboxes might be broken in this game, but it doesn't always happen in every single match that you play. Another thing i dislike is that the devs might change perks that don't need to be changed, and because of these changes there is a very high chance that your matches will change depending how the killer plays. Last but certainly not least, is that sometimes the devs take 1-3 weeks to fix perks that were fucked after a new update that had just been released.

There are some many things to talk about Dead By Daylight, although there might be some triggering points from time to time, I definitely recommend this game to friends, especially to new steam players who are looking for a game to buy. This is it for my review of Dead By Daylight. Have an amazing day and good luck in the fog everyone.

This game used to be fun, it really did. It's not even the addition of new perks or killers that ruined it, it is the studio that makes the game. They actually do not care. This game is probably the worst I have in my library. Not only that but I think it may be the worst game I have installed on my pc as well as being made by the worst of game studios and that is REALLY saying something because I have played smite for years and HiRez is garbage and I play League of Legends so ya know. The game is filled to the brim with bugs and match making issues. Some killers are completely broken, granted they are trying to fix those just not doing anywhere near a good job. The coding for this game is sloppy and anytime an update comes out to fix some things, that update breaks 5 more things. The community is toxic, the developers couldn't care about the game because they're the only ones to have a game of this genre that gets any real traction. I only play still to satisfy some of my friends who don't really play video games in general but love this one because of the horror theme. For this reason I can't wait for the new Evil Dead game and VHS so I never have to touch this steaming pile of garbage ever again. This game is the embodiment of "How the mighty have fallen"
Mr. Krabs I'm hooked

尽管现在的人屠环境很恶劣，外挂也挺猖獗，玩家之间互相搞心态，但作为一个萌新双边玩家（写下时我才200小时，人红二，屠银一）我在玩人类的时候非必要情况下（屠夫打针对需要嘲讽一下以至上头，不然减员就很难跑出去了）不会闪手电，蹲起；在玩屠夫的时候非必要情况下（四杀的局我也会放跑一个，也只会鞭那种脑残）也不会硬守尸，鞭尸。主要是觉得以上的这些行为很无趣，无意义。虽然说玩人类经常开局被贴脸守，玩屠夫经常碰上不会玩但是蹲起的门皇，但我依旧会坚持自己的原则（毕竟我觉得这是个正常人都应该了解到的），也希望未来的环境能够变得更好一些吧。（官方要是能有一些改动作为能加以调整就好了，血点对我来说是真不够用啊）

If you're thinking about buying Dead by Daylight, don't. BHVR has no idea how to balance the game and the spaghetti code that runs the backend makes the whole thing a buggy mess. If you really, REALLY want to play an asymmetrical horror game? Wait for VHS (or Video Horror Society) to come into an open beta phase or launch properly. Maybe when that game launches the devs will feel the squeeze and actually listen to their community and kick it into high gear to stay competitive. But until then, their monopoly on the asymmetrical horror genre makes their game a slowly sinking ship, a game I literally only play with friends, and only briefly.

The developers cater towards new players in order to make a quick buck. The managing of this game has a massive ego. Of all the problems with game balance, hackers, and matchmaking, they manage to pump-out cosmetics available for purchase or via Rift pass (Battle Pass / Season Pass / etc). The developers don't care about their veteran player base. I do not have a thousand hours yet, and there are players with at least 10 times the play time I do. The game has come a long way since its release, but the progress moves VERY SLOWLY.

随分前から息抜き程度にプレイしています。
ちょっと前からVtuberがプレイしていたのもあり、復帰しましたがマッチメイキングの酷さは相変わらずでもはや安心しました。キラーで深夜帯に行くと、余裕で最高ランクのサバイバーと「遊び」をさせられます。爆速で発電機が回り、[b]意図的に[/b]殴られに来たサバイバーを殴って見送るだけの単純作業です。見送るまでの間はジュース取ってきたりトイレ行くなりできます。ついにマッチ中にすら離席できるゲームに生まれ変わりました（その代わりマッチング時間が早くなってます）。

でも昔より萎え落ちが目に見えて減っているのでそこは高く評価しています。[b]ライトを持った人間はキャンプしてでも吊りますけど。[/b]

[b]어떤 내용의 게임 인가요?[/b]
온라인 협동 생존 공포 게임이며 4명의 인간 플레이어가 1명의 살인자 플레이어에 맞써 무사히 탈출하여야 하는 게임입니다.

[b]이 게임의 장점은 무엇인가요?[/b]
수준 높은 그래픽과 호기심이 가는 장르가 있습니다.

[b]이 게임의 단점은 무엇인가요?[/b]
유저간의 벨런스 차이가 나며 그런 벨런스 차이에 매칭 시스템마져 이상해 고랭크와 저랭크가 같이 잡히게 되는 경우가 많습니다.
그리고 스킬(퍽)의 벨런스 차이가 어느 정도 있고 살인마의 벨런스 차이도 심하여 인간이 살인마를 가지고 노는 경우가 많이 나옵니다. 캐릭터나 맵 마다 약간의 버그가 있습니다.
 
[b]얼마에 언제 구매하는 것이 좋을까요?[/b]
2020년 9월~2021년 9월까지 약 35%~60%의 할인률을 보이고 있으며 10월 11월 할인률이 높아 스팀 할인 이벤트가 곧 있으니 그때 구매하시는 것을 추천 드립니다.

[b]이 게임을 즐기는데 꿀팁이 있을까요?[/b]
살인마를 플레이 하시고픈 유저는 소위 말하는 사기캐나 난이도가 쉬우면서 강력한 캐릭터를 하시는걸 추천 드리고 살인마나 인간 캐릭터의 특정 레벨이 되면 그 캐릭터의 고유 스킬(퍽)을 전승시킬 수 있는데 효율이 높거나 좋은 스킬(퍽)을 가지고 있는 캐릭터를 먼저 키워 다른 캐릭터를 할때 사용하여 좋은 시너지를 발휘하면 보다 쉽게 게임을 이길 수 있습니다. 초반 캐릭터가 레벨이 낮을때는 사용 스킬(퍽) 갯수도 적어 두둘겨 맞으면서 배워야 함으로 참고 부탁드립니다.
